00038 void writeTestEntries(ostream& os)
00039 {
00040     os << ">IPI:IPI00000001.2|SWISS-PROT:O95793-1|..." << endl;

00046     os << "KEPEYTLLTERGLPRRREFVMQVKVGNHTAEGTGTNKKVAKRNAAENMLEILGFKVPQAQ" << endl;
00047     os << "PTKPALKSEEKTPIKKPGDGRKVTFFEPGSGDENGTSNKEDEFRMPYLSHQQLPAGILPM" << endl;

00058 
00059 void test()
00060 {
00061     string filename = "IPIFASTADatabaseTest.test.txt";
00062     ofstream os(filename.c_str());
00063     writeTestEntries(os);
00064     os.close();
00065 
00066     IPIFASTADatabase db(filename);
00067     unit_assert(db.records().size() == 2);
00068 
00069     IPIFASTADatabase::const_iterator it = db.records().begin();
00070     unit_assert(it->id == 1);
00071     unit_assert(it->sequence.size() == 577);
00072     unit_assert(it->sequence.find("PVPPLL") == 120);
00073     if (os_) *os_ << *it << endl;
00074 
00075     ++it;
00076     unit_assert(it->id == 5);
00077     unit_assert(it->sequence.size() == 189);
00078     unit_assert(it->sequence.find("PTRTVD") == 120);
00079     if (os_) *os_ << *it << endl;
00080 
00081     system(("rm " + filename).c_str());
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void testRealDatabase()
00086 {
00087     IPIFASTADatabase db("ipi.HUMAN.fasta");
00088     cout << "record count: " << db.records().size() << endl;
00089    
00090     if (!db.records().empty())
00091     {
00092         const IPIFASTADatabase::Record* record = &db.records().back();
00093         cout << *record << endl;
00094     }
00095 }

00098 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00099 {
00100     try
00101     {
00102         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00103         if (os_) *os_ << "IPIFASTADatabaseTest\n";
00104         test();
00105         //testRealDatabase();
00106         return 0;
00107     }
00108     catch (exception& e)
00109     {
00110         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00111         return 1;
00112     }
00113 }
